text: Mount Ruapehu is an active volcano on North Island, New Zealand. It is the highest mountain in North Island with a height of . It is located in Taupo, New Zealand. It last erupted in September 2007. ==History== In 1948, an airplane crashed into the volcano. All the people in the airplane died.Christchurch City Libraries, New Zealand Disasters, "Aircraft Accident: Lockheed Electra ZK-AGK Kaka"; rtrieved 2012-6-15. ==References== Category:Volcanoes of New Zealand Category:Mountains of New Zealand
title: Mount Ruapehu
